description.value: Major Curse You are unable to keep up with the rigors of combat. The moment a combat breaks out, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1}. At the end of each of your turns, your @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed} condition increases by 1. These conditions end only when you are no longer in combat.
